articles.title: Coronavirus: German contact-tracing app takes different path to NHS - BBC News
articles.description: Germany's contact-tracing app will not accept self-diagnosis reports, despite NHS saying they can save lives.
articles.content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
Germany's forthcoming coronavirus contact-tracing app will trigger alerts only if users test positive for Covid-19.
That puts it at odds with the NHS app, which instead relies on users self-diagnosing via an on-screen questionnai… [+4130 chars]
